'!heap.description: Sets the amount of RAM used for the HEAP, must be at the start of the program.

body: LoadSDBank("vt24000.bin",0,0,0,33) 				' load the music replayer into bank 33
InitSFX(36)							            ' init the SFX engine, sfx are in bank 36
InitMusic(${2|34},$1,0000)				            ' init the music engine 33 has the player, 34 the pt3, 0000 the offset in bank 34
EnableSFX							            ' Enables the AYFX, use DisableSFX to top
EnableMusic 						            ' Enables Music, use DisableMusic to stop
AYFX & Music Interrupt.description: This code will produce a code block for uysing Shiru's AYFX and playing PT3 files on interrupt. The interrupt is dynamically created.

BBREAK - Basic breakpoint.description:
Sets a CSpect breakpoint, will be ignored on real hw.

**For use in an basic block, for asm use **BREAK**

BREAK - ASM breakpoint.description:
Sets a CSpect breakpoint, will be ignored on real hw.

**For use in an ASM block, for basic use **BBREAK**

ClipSprite(x1,x2,y1,y2).description: Clips the visible area for sprites

ClipTile(x1,x2,y1,y2).description: Sets visible clipping of the HW tilemap, nb X is doubled to support 320x256

ClipULA(x1,x2,y1,y2).description: Sets visible clipping of the ULA

Command Line.description: Example cmd line to run after compile

Copy BIN.description: Copies the binary file to a location

Copy File.description: Copies the final NEX to a location

Creat ASM fiel.description: Compiles the output to an ASM file

Dim var AS type AT.description: Defines a global variable of type

DisableMusic.description: Disables Music in the interrupt initiated with SetUpIM()

DisableSFX.description: Disables SFX in the interrupt initiated with SetUpIM()

DoTile8(X,Y,Tile).description: Draw a 256 colour 8x8px tile at x,y on Layer2 256x192

DoTileBank16(X,Y,Tile,Bank).description:
Draw a 256 colour 16x16px tile from bank at x,y on Layer2 256x192.

Max tile number = 256

DoTileBank8(X,Y,Tile,Bank).description:
Draw a 256 colour 8x8px tile from bank at x,y on Layer2 256x192.

Max tile number = 256

DoTile(X,Y,Tile).description: Draw a 256 colour 16x16px tile at x,y on Layer2 256x192

DrawImage(X, Y, *Image, frame, transpare.description:
Draw an image at x,y on Layer2 256x192.

*Image is a pointer to the image data.
frame is the frame to draw.
transparent is the transparent colour.

EnableMusic.description: Enable Music in the interrupt initiated with SetUpIM()

EnableSFX.description: Enables SFX in the interrupt initiated with SetUpIM()

FDoTile16(Tile,X,Y,Bank).description:
Draw a 256 colour 16x16px tile from
bank at x,y on Layer2 320x256. Max tile number = 256

FDoTile8(Tile,X,Y,Bank).description:
Draw a 256 colour 8x8px tile from
bank at x,y on Layer2 320x256. Max tile number = 256

FL2Text(X,Y,String,Bank).description: Draw text on L2 320x256 with 8x8 font in bank

FPlotL2(X,Y,String,Bank).description: Plot pixel on L2 320x256 with colour

FreeBank(bank).description: Free bank thank that was obtained with ReserveBank()

GetKeyScanCode()=nn.description: Returns scancode if key is press otherwise 0. You will need keys.bas include

InitLayer2(SCREENMODE).description: Sets the Layer2 screen mode - see [InitLayer2](initlayer2.md)

InitMusic(playerbank,musicbank,address o.description: Initialise the VortexTracker2 routine in playerbank, with a pt3 file in musicbank with optional offset

InitPalette(pallete_sel[, bank, start in.description: Uploads a palette to the selected palette system see [InitPalette](initpalette.md). You can this command with only the first parameter set, the rest will be set to 0 (default).

InitSFX(bank).description: Initialise AYFX afb data in bank

InitSprites2(nr of sprites,address,sprit.description: Upload nr sprites from address, 8 or 4 bit supported from a specified bank

InitSprites(nr of sprites,address).description: Upload nr sprites from address, 8 or 4 bit supported

inkey.description: Returns keycode, use GetKeyScanCode() from keys.bas

KEY.description: For use with GetKeyScanCode()=KEYx or MultiKey(KEYx), requires keys.bas include

L2Text(X,Y,String$,Bank).description: Draw string on Layer2 256x192 using 8x8 font from specified bank. Use the mask to specify a colour to mask out.

Loading Bitmap.description: Use image.bmp as a loading file for the

LoadSDBank(...).description: Loads a file into specified memory banks. Disable this when you create your final NEX by putting #Define NEX before the nextlib

LoadSD(filename,address,length,offset).description: Loads a file from SD to memory, length needs to be provided

Module.description: Tells the precompile this is a module of a master NEX

MultiKey(ScanCode)=.description: Can be used to detect multiple key presses as once. You will need keys.bas include

nextreg reg,a or value.description: This needs to be in an asm block as direct inline asm. Can take either value or a

NextReg(reg,value as const).description: Sets Nextreg reg with constant value (ie, a direct number). If you want to use a variable for the value use NextRegA(reg,var)

No Header.description: Create a compilation with to ZXBC pre-amble startup code

No NEX file.description: Do not create a NEX file

No Stack.description: Do not set the stack to within the NEX address range, leave floating

No SysVars.description: Do not include the System Varibles in the final output

Optimisation.description: Default = 4, options between 2-4, with 4 taking the longest to compile

Origin address.description: Start address of code in decimal

PalUpload(address as uinteger, colours a.description: Upload a palette from address, number of colours, offset and optional bank

pause nframes.description: Pause n frames, please use WaitRaster(n) instead

PlotL2(x,y,colour).description: Plot a pixel on Layer2 256x192 with colour

read var/string....description: READ var or string, use with RESTORE and DATA

RemoveSprite(sprite id,visibility).description: Remove sprite with id, 0 = off, 1 = on

ReserveBank().description: byte = ReserveBank(), returns free bank from NextZXOS

restore label.description: RESTORE label containing DATA for use with READ

SaveSD(filename,address,length).description: Save a file from memory to SD, length needs to be provided

SetUpIM().description: Initialise and start dynamic Interrupt routine for use with InitSFX(), InitMusic(), PlaySFX(). Make sure you #DEFINE IM2 before you include the nextlib

body: InitSprites2(63,\$0000,${2:bank})       ' 63 nr of sprites to upload from bank
Setup Sprite Templates From File.description: This code loads a sprite file, pages in relevant banks and then uploads ending with putting back the default banks. This is intended ot be run in the load block of code.

Set HEAP.description: Sets the amount of RAM used for the HEAP

Simple timer snippet.description: This code creates a simple timer that triggers on a set value

Specify Origin.description: Tells the precompile to compile the origin bas file

body: ; setting registers in an asm block means you can use the global equs for register names
nextreg SPRITE_CONTROL_NR_15,%00000011  ; %000    S L U, %11 sprites on over border
Template For 256x192L2.description: This template sets registers and include nextlib for 320x256x8bpp

TileMap(address,offset,nrtiles,x,y,width.description: Does a software L2 256x192 tilemap. address = mapdata, offset = block to start counting from, nrtiles = how many tiles to draw, x/y = x/y position to top left corner of tilemap, width = width of tilemap on scree, worldwidth = nr of tiles x in world

UpdateSprite(uint x,y,id,image,attr3,att.description: Updates the sprite with id set. Sprite attribute 3 and 4 are supported (flip, scale, rotate, anchor etc)

VAL string$.description: Turns string into a numerical value eg : a = VAL "5"

WaitKey().description: Waits for keyboard or kempston 1 to be pressed

WaitRaster(nn).description: Wait until the raster line is nn

while n=n : wend.description:
Create a WHILE : WEND eg:
While a < b
  Let a = a + 1
 Poke a, 0
End While

#define IM2.description: Required for SetUpIM2() and related music + ayfx routines

#define NEX.description: Required for finalising your NEX to disable LoadSDBank code

#include <nextlib.bas>.description: Include the nextlib or other zxb lib, make sure this is after any #DEFINEs for NEX, DEBUG, IM2

'!asm.description: Compile and output to asm, no NEX is created. No emulator is launched.

'!bmp=file.bmp.description: BMP to be used as a loading screen when creating a NEX

'!copy=drive:\\file.ext.description: Copies the NEX output to a specified location

'!heap=size.description: Size in bytes of heap, default is 2048

'!noemu.description: Do not launch emulator after compilation

'!org=address.description: Start address of your program, default is 32768
